org.jooby.json

Class JacksonView<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooby.json.JacksonView<T>

  • public class JacksonView<T>
extends Object
    Dynamic jackson view support. Usage: 
    

 {
   use(new Jackson());

   get("/public", req -> {
     Item item = ...;
     return new JacksonView<Item>(Views.Public.class, item);
   });
 }
